channel.title: Big help please!
channel.description:
Im wanting this...
Like when someone says ::save before they log out or when they log out it saved their attack and all their other skills to a notepad and when i open the notepad it will say this... i want it to save their xp like this
[code]Man2322 Attack - 34442 Strength - 93431 Defence - 23211 Hitpoints - 23422 AND ALL THE OTHER SKILS Girl3834 Attack - 23223 Strength - 23232 Defence - 9933 ETC...[/code]
PLEASE POST

item.title: Big help please!
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
